alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:53AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Red Lodge Foothills. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Strongest winds expected through this evening. Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...During periods of snow, blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris, tree limbs, and downed power lines. Use caution if you must drive. Secure loose objects on your property to avoid damage. Ranchers should take precautions to protect young livestock. Don`t cause a spark!
